Protocol description:
n_sensors: number of horizontal and vertical sensors after interpolation
(optional)

bars: location of the cursor (in X and Y)

trace: ? (sorry, don't know what this was supposed to do; does not seem to do
anything useful)

range: minimum and maximum value to display (not entirely sure how I'm using
this, but I think the visualization is clipped to these values)

view: algorithm can show several data types; most interesting is "delta" (or
"raw" when debugging the sensor)

pause: either 0 or 1. If 0: continuous calibration of background level is
performed on those pixels where the delta of background level - current level is
below a certain limit. If 1: continuous calibration is disabled

mode: either "negative" (for pressure sensing) or "positive" (for presence
sensing)

fps: number of frames per second (currently about 12 - 15; can hopefully be
increased much more)

data: the actual data is in a one dimensional array (sorry; a 2D array would
have been nicer). In python I can convert it to a 2D array with data =
numpy.array(decoded['data']).reshape((n_sensors[1], n_sensors[0]))

state: one dimensional array that shows the state of each pixel. State is as
follows:
1: calibrating
2: released (difference between raw value and background value is less than a
certain threshold; pressure on pixel is very low or 0)
3: approaching (difference between raw value and background value is higher in
between two thresholds; not very useful for pressure sensing but useful for
touch sensing)
4: released_to_pressed: difference is higher than 2nd threshold, but not for
long enough; pixel is likely to be touched
5: pressed: difference is higher than 2nd threshold and for a longer time; pixel
is touched
6: pressed_to_released: difference is lower than 2nd threshold but not for long
enough; pixel is likely not touched any more

example of a json msg:

{"data":[18.7109,21.5076,23.5828,21.4597,15.3359,13.9725,14.1268,15.0454,15.25,14.7572,14.7004,16.6527,15.6094,13.7966,14.1889,15.4105,14.6094,12.7107,14.7378,12.1845,13.25,11.7356,13.8871,13.2369,14.3281,13.6953,11.2236,14.2086,14.1016,13.4682,11.954,12.3601,13.6484,12.0666,14.7372,13.8722,10.5156,11.374,12.3205,14.8323,16.4141,16.4277,15.3097,16.5889,17.4922,16.033,13.2145,11.8927,12.5547,13.1091,14.4013,16.0352,16.7891,17.3623,17.3443,14.925,15.7969,16.6193,17.0512,17.1385,18.0625,14.6761,15.7237,15.4559,14.9714,13.4947,15.0098,15.565,15.396,14.5372,12.8369,11.3119,11.2765,11.0319,11.7283,12.3757,12.8526,13.4571,14.3988,14.5851,13.913,14.8845,12.877,12.0259,12.2497,12.0901,12.4205,11.0167,9.6884,10.493,9.29382,8.41579,8.70186,9.82223,8.80914,8.87119,9.23101,7.9033,8.07059,7.88909,7.63911,10.036,11.5272,12.0553,10.9914,10.4099,12.1183,10.5736,11.4696,11.8148,10.7908,12.7064,14.5133,14.4871,12.8916,12.8133,12.5811,13.1817,14.5399,15.2449,14.1064,12.7109,13.0848,13.5513,15.0854,15.427,15.5626,16.9345,17.9967,18.2866,17.0276,15.138,13.8432,14.5675,12.6597,10.1843,8.43045,11.68,14.4573,15.0047,13.7798,13.6905,15.0192,14.4363,13.2692,14.0327,13.8538,12.615,10.6448,8.19895,7.08983,6.03946,6.89571,7.31497,7.27941,6.92385,7.22377,5.99481,6.46335,6.58081,6.48459,6.25131,7.48839,7.73232,9.92269,9.28755,10.3177,11.3299,11.4892,10.4872,10.5205,10.9786,12.6409,12.7413,13.1885,12.5119,11.3043,11.4789,12.1273,13.7229,14.2785,12.3796,9.70894,14.1455,13.1438,14.1013,15.6137,17.1828,17.9901,18.1974,17.7077,16.9398,17.0144,17.524,17.2332,14.9446,11.9118,9.81104,10.8675,13.0962,13.1759,11.9646,13.4949,13.3696,12.6913,10.2478,9.6308,9.87814,8.22643,6.25067,7.31803,7.52694,5.28002,6.24901,6.47378,6.18361,5.53247,5.76178,5.63486,5.32178,6.01762,5.06887,5.49626,6.53176,8.25039,8.85682,8.83694,9.55023,10.5668,10.4651,10.4289,10.7744,11.0624,12.0008,12.8971,13.8731,13.7736,11.6853,11.0032,11.6073,12.8584,12.7908,10.6703,8.32107,13.3516,13.9457,15.3546,17.6073,18.5781,18.3661,16.6637,16.615
